title: Best Tech Support
desc: Whatever questions you'll have regarding your Woostroid theme in the future, we'll have your back. 24/7!

title: Full Documentation
desc: Detailed documentation is one of the keys of an easy wokflow. We've ensured that it's so by streamlining it amap!

title: Mighty Power Builder
desc: Editing the pages' layout has never been easier or more coding-free than it is with Woostroid!

title: Any Screen Ready!
desc: Fully responsive thanks to both the Flexbox & Bootstrap, Woostoid will look mesmerizing on device of any size!

title: Live Customizer
desc: This tool makes adding real-time adjustments to your e-store's look, fonts etc so much easier.

title: GPL 3 License
desc: This public license provides you with an unlimited number of personal and commercial copies of the theme for usage!

title: 5+ Diverse Skins
desc: When it comes to design & aesthetics, Woostroid beats any other ecommerce theme hands down, both in versatility & quality!

title: Tens of Plugins
desc: Featuring tons of built-in custom plugins, Woostroid-based e-store will always have great functionality for your visitors!

title: Woo & Ecwid Ready
desc: Flexible choice, with as many as 2 ecommerce options integrated into the Woostroid theme simultaneously...

title: Super Easy Installation
desc: While Wordpress itself is famous for its streamlined setup process, installing Woostroid gets even easier!
